title: Righteous Gaming Looking to make a Second Team
body:
Righteous Gaming is a Gaming Organisation that has had success with its Main team and is looking to fill positions to make up a second team to carry on that success. The main team Redemption has been participating in SumSoc for a number of weeks now and is in good position to make top 8. 

(Link provided is the SumSoc Ladder Points: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b4t3gb8YM0S-FMWm-jYs6H3b45tNO5uZsogBxP55egw/edit#gid=1128925018 )

Redemption is currently looking for a Manager and a Coach, any previous experience would be appreciated but not a prerequisite. 

Our Main goal when forming this second team is to constantly scrim between the two teams and find mature, committed players wanting to improve themselves as well as wanting to be apart of the Righteous Gaming family.

We are accepting players that were** Diamond** last season and are currently **Plat 3 - Diamond** this season. You must be atleast 17-18 years of age.
We also understand that there's some special cases and we will deal with that when it comes up.


**The current positions available are:**

Top, Mid, ADC and Support.

Feel free to contact me on Discord: **Berserk #8041** including what position you are applying for plus your op.gg.

replies.body:
Plat 1 last season, gold 1 currently just started season again support main
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=jules
17 yrs old
cheers if you could consider me for tryouts

When an "organisation" misspells "there're"... Not really professional
